name: On the Scrounge
description: Loot pickup rewards increased by +15%; Primary and Secondary ammo capacity lowered by 20%

name: No Backups
description: Player reload speed increased by 15%; No secondary weapon. (ammo capacity lowered by 100%)

name: This is Gonna Hurt
description: Enemies take 15% more damage; Bleedout timer reduced to 15 seconds

name: Not in the Face!
description: Critical chances increased by 10%; Headshots don't do damage

name: Loaded for Bear
description: Primary and Secondary ammo capacity increased by 20%; All movement speeds reduced by 15%

name: Total Carnage!
description: Ammo pickups refill grenades. Every enemy is dismembered.; Enemies vulnerable only to explosions and melee.

name: Switch Hitter
description: Shooting your secondary weapon fills up your primary ammo.; Shooting your primary weapon consumes both primary and secondary ammo.

name: Gunslingers
description: Pistol damage increased by 15%; No primary weapon. (ammo capacity lowered by 100%)

name: Fresh Troops
description: Loot drop chance increased by 25%; Enemies have 50% more Health

name: Don't You Die On Me!
description: Bleedout timer increased by 10 seconds.; None of the players can ever die during the raid.

name: No Second Chances
description: Player Health is increased by 10; None of the players can ever go to bleedout during the raid.

name: A Perfect Score
description: All chests are locked.; None of the players can fail a minigame.

name: Helmet Shortage
description: Headshots are instant kill.; Player Health is reduced by 50%

name: Hemorrhaging
description: Every melee kill regenerates 10% health.; 20% health drained per minute.

name: Crab People
description: Player movement speed is greatly increased.; You can only walk backwards or sideways (strafe)

name: Slasher movie
description: Melee damage is increased. Health is regenerated over time.; Player can only use a melee weapon. Warcries are disabled.

name: Pumpkin pie
description: Headshot damage increased by 100%; Attacking is possible only while in air

name: Season of resurrection
description: Damage output greatly increased on low HP; There is no bleedout and players can only be revived by others destroying a special pumpkin

name: Limited Supplies
description: Loot pickup rewards increased by 15%; Primary and Secondary ammo capacity lowered by 20%

name: Take the Cannoli
description: No movement penalties for carrying heavy objects; Enemy loot drop chances lowered by 15%

name: Real Tough Guys
description: Bleedout timer increased by 5 seconds.; Enemies have 10% more Health

name: Nichtsplosions
description: Player reload speed increased by 15%; Enemies are impervious to explosive damage.

name: War Weary
description: Enemies take 10% more damage; Loot pickup rewards reduced by 25%

name: Special Delivery
description: Player movement speed is greatly increased.; Special enemies deal 50% more damage.

name: Don't Blink
description: Loot drop chance increased by 10%; Enemy loot drops disappear after 5 seconds.

name: Bad Coffee
description: Player reload speed increased by 10%; Bleedout timer reduced to 15 seconds

name: Playing for Keeps
description: Enemies take 10% more damage; Player Health is reduced by 25

name: Silent Shout
description: Every melee kill regenerates 10% health.; Fails if player uses a Warcry.

name: Blow Me
description: Grenade damage increased by 100%.; Primary and Secondary ammo capacity lowered by 50%

name: You Only Live Once
description: Health regenerates 5% on every kill.; None of the players can ever die during the duration of the operation.

name: Controlled Bursts
description: Critical chances increased by 7%; Must be completed without any player emptying the magazine of any weapon.

name: Elite Opponents
description: Loot drop chance increased by 25%; Enemies have 50% more Health

name: Headaches For All
description: Headshot damage increased by 50%; Enemies vulnerable only to headshots.

name: ERROR: challenge_card_ra_b_salvage_rights_name_id
description: Loot pickup rewards increased by 10%;

name: Walk it off
description: Bleedout timer increased by 5 seconds.

name: ERROR: challenge_card_ra_b_true_gift_name_id
description: Bleedout timer increased by 7.5 seconds.;

name: In fine feather
description: Player Health is increased by 10%

name: Precision fire
description: Enemies take 10% more damage.

name: ERROR: challenge_card_ra_b_hale_and_hearty_name_id
description: Player Health is increased by 15%;

name: Recycle for victory
description: Loot pickup rewards increased by 10%

name: ERROR: challenge_card_op_b_tough_it_out_name_id
description: Bleedout timer increased by 5 seconds.;

name: Will not go quietly
description: Bleedout timer increased by 7.5 seconds.

description: Player Health is increased by 10%;

name: ERROR: challenge_card_op_b_crack_shots_name_id
description: Enemies take 10% more damage.;

name: On top form
description: Player Health is increased by 15%

name: I have trust in my aim
description: Enemy has 2x life, player has 21% more headshot damage

name: Engineering
description: You are not allowed to fail an interaction wheel minigame, but there are no barrages

name: It's all in your head
description: Enemies only die from headshots, but you regen 2% life every 5 seconds

name: Ze glass cannons!
description: Enemies does x2 ammount of damage, but they have 50% less health

name: Where's the health!?
description: Health drops despawn after 10 seconds, but player reload speed is 25% faster

name: Double damage for them, but more xp for me
description: Enemies do x3 ammount of damage, but you get 210% xp

name: No snipers, no cry
description: The bleedout timer is 14 seconds shorter, but there will be no snipers

name: One bullet at a time
description: Enemies take 20% more damage, but the players can only shoot with single fire

name: Fast and furious
description: Complete the raid within 14 minutes, but your grenades have increased radius by 4 meters

name: Lighter for nothing
description: All bags weight 50% less, but no enemies will drop ammo or health

name: The fast spender
description: Bags do not slow you down, but every bullet fired counts as 2 bullets

name: Explosive weakness
description: Enemies do not take explosive damage, but they do 50% less damage in general

name: Double damage for them, but more xp for me
description: Players can't ever go into bleedout, but they will earn 200% XP

name: Greedy bastards
description: The loot drop chance from enemies is lowered to 40%, but players have 50% more primary ammo

name: Scavengers
description: The drop chance from enemies is 0, but enemies take 50% mora damage

name: Fully loaded pistol!
description: Players can only use pistols, but you can carry 300% of secondary ammo

description:
